cleaned_text: Weight Balance Capsule is a proprietary Ayurvedic medicine manufactured by Organic India Pvt Ltd. It is used in the treatment of excess weight and obesity. Weight Balance Capsule Ingredients Each 325 vegetarian capsule contains in Mg of [Bhumyamalaki](https://easyayurveda.com/2017/05/09/bhumyamalaki-phyllanthus-niruri/) - Phyllanthus niruri - 125 mg - It has hepato protective, anti-viral and diuretic properties. Supports reduction and elimination of nephrolithiasis. [Guduchi ](https://easyayurveda.com/2012/08/28/guduchi-giloy-ayurvedic-details-benefits-usage-dose-formulations/)- Giloy - Tinospora cordifolia - 125 mg - It Controls glucose metabolism. It has immuno-modulatory, anti-stress and anti-inflammatory properties. Amalaki - Gooseberry - Phyllanthus emblica - 75 mg - Powerful anti-oxidant, reduces stress during weight loss. It has anti-fatigue, mild laxative effects. Indications Excess weight and obesity, fatigue in patients of normal weight, complements allopathic therapy, especially useful when excess weight exacerbates symptoms of arthritis and diabetes mellitus. Post viral fever, when the patient complains of body, muscle and joint pains Dosage 1 to 2 capsules twice or thrice a day. Or as directed by the physician. With western medicines Seek your doctor's advice if you are taking this product along with other western (allopathic/modern) medicines. Some Ayurvedic herbs can interact with modern medicine. If both Ayurvedic and allopathic medicines are advised together, then it is best to take allopathic medicine first, wait for 30 minutes and then, after a gap of 15 - 30 minutes, take Ayurvedic medicine Can this be used while taking Homeopathic medicine? Yes. This product does not react with homeopathic medicine. With supplements like multivitamin tablets, Omega 3 fatty acids etc? Yes. Generally, this product goes well with most of the dietary supplements. However, if you are taking more than one product per day, please consult your doctor for an opinion. Presentation: 10 capsules, 60 capsules Weight Balance Capsule Side effects There are no known side effects with this medicine. However, it is best to use this medicine under medical supervision. Store in a cool dry place, away from sunlight. Keep out of reach and sight of children. Seek your doctor's advice for its usage during pregnancy, lactation period and in children. Manufactured By: Organic India Pvt. Ltd. How long to use? This product can be used for a period of 2 - 3 months of time, based on your doctor's advice. Shelf life: 3 years from the date of manufacturing.
